iti33:2.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
iti33:2.3: Bhaddakena ca sīlena, bhaddikāya ca diṭṭhiyā.
iti33:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
iti33:4.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
